Subject: Trouble For The Maximals
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He turns towards the CF, as a explosian rips a giant hole in it.
"What the..."
Breakdown's shell goes off, shrapnel ripping into Hot Rod's  back.
"Arggggg! Something tells me everything just went real wrong."
He gets back to his feet, shooting two rockets at Breakdown.
